subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] THe Ovilus
author: Bryan Whatley
full_text:
--0-2131704387-1218547952=:73195
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

I don't think the Puck and Ovilus work together.  They are separate pieces with the same basic concepts, only different features.

I'm not sure of the exact mathematical calculations on what it does (have to look through older emails), but based off the result, it assigns it a word from a list.  As always, I assume there is a chance that it could leave words out as nothing is complete in the paranormal world.  Again, don't quote me, Bill Chappal, who I believe built it, would know much better than me.

One day I'll get enough money to buy one and try it out.  I'm a technie geek so I like to have the latest toys. :)



----- Original Message ----
From: "Fransen, Debbie" <debbie.fransen@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, August 12, 2008 8:14:56 AM
Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] THe Ovilus


Thanks Bryan for replying
I was absolutely amazed when I saw that. 
Does the puck and the ovilus work together? 
This is very interesting. How do you think it works as far 
as
assigning a word according to the results from the 
sensors?
Could it leave words out? Example: What if something 
said
Demon ( that was in Paranormal State) and it was trying 
to
say Not Demon?
 


________________________________
 From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
[mailto:EVP- ITC@yahoogroups. com] On Behalf Of Bryan 
Whatley
Sent: Tuesday, August 12, 2008 9:11 AM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] THe 
Ovilus


Hi Debbie,
   I think the Ovilus is similar to the Paranormal 
Puck.  What it does is take constant evironmental readings off the sensors 
inside it, does some math on them, then based off the result, assigns it to a 
word from a list of words it knows.  That word is then output through a 
speakjet microchip that you hear.
   I could be wrong though, but 
from my techie point of view...it's pretty darn cool. :)
All the 
best,
Bryan  



----- 
Original Message ----
From: "Fransen, Debbie" 
<debbie.fransen@ delta.com>
To: 
EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Sent: Tuesday, August 12, 2008 7:41:17 
AM
Subject: [EVP-ITC] THe Ovilus


I don't know how 
many of the members watch Paranormal State, but they used
a new piece of 
equipment called The Ovilus. You guys have got to check this
out. Go to www.digitaldowsing. com. I am not really sure who these guys 
are, and
where they came up 
with this. To me, it sounds kind of like Frank's Box, but
not the 
same.
Frank, please take a 
look at this, and tell us what  you think.
I don't understand 
how it works......
Deb
